name: Doppelganger, Dawn of The Inverted Souls
summary:
What if your wish actually can come true? You just wish and someone else will do it for you. It comes with a price though…

Play as LUCIA NICOL, a snobbish girl who only thinks of herself. She’s trapped in a weird situation after she wished for those who bullied her, ANASTASIA and her gang to feel the same thing. One by one, they are attacked and their body parts were taken. All the clues points to Lucia, but Lucia knows for sure she didn’t do any of those… Could it be that the delinquent YURI IVANOV did it?

Meanwhile, some of the people she knows disappear as well, like ENRICO MORETTI and Lucia starts to see people… Those who cannot be seen and heard by others, such as CLIFFORD RHODES. Even his brother, ARTHUR NICOL, says she’s crazy.

Her schoolmates, JUN SUWABARA, BLAKE LANDERS, RAPHAEL MARTIS, IGNATOUS IVANOV and LEE ZHUYUAN also have some things they hide… And they are also involved in this thing…. Are they enemies or are they allies?

What’s happening to Lucia? Will she be able to prove herself innocent? Will she save everyone who’s been missing? What is the source of all these?

With six different paths, more than ten different endings, and many unlockable bonus… Solve this mystery please!
